text: More than half a million people in the #UnitedKingdom received a dose of #COVID19 #vaccine in a day,official data showed on Thursday, raising the total who have had 2 doses past 6 million. A total of 31.8 million have now had at least 1 dose, while 6.1 million have had 2 https://t.co/7FELqWURiC
